column5: Beautiful Oak Cliff home nestled amongst mature oak trees offers a 15 minute drive to Bishop Arts, Trinity Groves, Downtown & Uptown Dallas, and Deep Ellum! Our spacious home is also located 25 minutes from AT&T Stadium & Globe Life Park in Arlington (Cowboys & Rangers) via 303 or Keist. We are also 20 minutes from Grand Prairie, Joe Pool Lake and Cedar Hill State Park.
column8: Cozy & Charming Home in Oak Cliff
